item.title: International Left-Handers Day
item.description: Origin of Left-Handers Day International Left-Handers Day is celebrated annually on August 13th to raise awareness about the advantages and disadvantages of being left-handed in a predominantly right-handed world. It was first observed in 1976 by Dean R. Campbell, founder of the Lefthanders International Inc. Advantages of being left-handed Sure! Left-handed people have many advantages. They have the ability to fully utilize both sides of their brain, making them excel in many areas.
